Add as friend Send Msg Fuddruckers RJones December 6, 2008 2.0 2.0 star rating 0 0 0 0 Votes Large Portion, Cheap Price
You get what you pay for at Fuddruckers, where they serve large portions at relatively cheap prices. A step up from a fast food place with a drive through, a step down from Chillies/ TGIF /Applebees. They have just enough varriety for a family to dine out, which is clearly their target customers. The place is decorated for children. You order&pick up your food at the counter, saving money on tips.
The nacho appetizers are large enough to be a meal in themselves, and the staff actualy laughed at me for ordering them as an appetizer on my first visit. The burgers are served without condements, and there is a condement bar with everthing from lettuce&tomato to dressings, clearly designed for picky eaters.
